lead_paragraph: Real Madrid's hopes of an 11th European title were left hanging by a thread as they slumped to a shock 2-0 loss at Germany's Champions League novices VfL Wolfsburg in their quarter-final first leg on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Wolfsburg Shock Real Madrid 2-0 to Crown Big European Night
headline.main: Wolfsburg Shock Real Madrid 2-0 to Crown Big European Night
